title: Corporate Education Flipped Learning-Based Science Teaching Method Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Middle School Science Education Theory and Basic Understanding of Flipped Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: Competency-building program combining flipped learning and PBL to train pre-service/in-service teachers in designing and operating effective science education in corporate settings

learning_goals: Learners can design science education content in three or more formats applying the flipped learning model
Learners can perform projects analyzing and proposing solutions to real-world scientific problems in corporate settings using problem-based learning (PBL)
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning strategies in smartphone-based learning environments
Educational design competencies can be improved through peer assessment and feedback processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
